overview.title: Share Better
overview.text: Connect and share instantly with 3G 42 Mbps speed.

overview.title: It’s a Beautiful Thing
overview.text: Take one look at the Ascend G6 3G and you’ll immediately notice what sets it apart from the rest. Its unbelievably slim 7.85 mm profile, stylish shape and elegantly curved edges take smartphone design to a new level of perfection.

overview.title: DLNA Sharing
overview.text: DLNA sharing can give you more convenience.

overview.title: Emotion UI
overview.text: Huawei Emotion UI is easy to use, convenient and efficient, gives you a smarter experience.

specification.title: Memory
text: Micro SD Card up to 32 GB

specification.title: Camera
text: Rear Camera: 8 MP AF BSI F2.0, with Flash

specification.title: Audio
text: Audio encoding: MP3, MIDI, AMR-NB, AMR-WB, AAC, AAC+, eAAC+
Audio file formats: MP3, MP4, 3GP, OGG, AMR, AAC, WAV, MIDI
